channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: New York Sues Over Rule Barring Thousands of Immigrants From SNAP

item.title: Medicare negotiated lower prices for 15 drugs, including 71% off Ozempic and Wegovy

item.title: Health Care, Ukraine Differences Roil a Chaotic G.O.P. Congress

item.title: 4 marketing tricks to not fall for this holiday season
item.description: Retailers use marketing techniques to get you to spend more, like creating a false sense of urgency or creating artificial discounts. Outsmart the gim...

item.title: How to watch the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade
item.description: The Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade is back this year and promises to be bigger than ever. Here's a preview of what to expect and how to watch.

item.title: Trump defends key negotiator after leaked phone call appears to show him coaching Russia
item.description: A transcript of the call appears to show Steve Witkoff coaching his Russian counterpart on how they could get a better deal to end the war in Ukraine

item.title: ‘In Triage Every Day’: A Beleaguered Speaker Says He’s Overwhelmed
item.description: In a podcast interview, Speaker Mike Johnson opened up about the crushing demands of a job that he joked was his in name only.

item.title: Judge Dismisses Georgia Election Interference Case Against Trump
item.description: The president has now seen three criminal cases against him dissolve since he was re-elected last year.

item.title: The Loneliness of Using a Faith-Based Chatbot
item.description: Faith is not meant to be transactional or tailored to you.

item.title: An Asia-Pacific Showdown
item.description: China and Japan are in a diplomatic feud over Taiwan, with President Trump in the middle.

item.title: Deadly, fast-moving fire is less likely in Midtown Manhattan, experts say.
item.description: The area’s high-rises have robust safety features and are not as densely packed as those in Hong Kong, making them less susceptible to blazes.
